name: Cybernetic Eye, Active Infrared (TL-12)
description:
The active infrared cybernetic eye can detect objects illuminated by infrared light (NIF visual bands) that is generated by the eye. The eye has a range of 60 meters, but will not penetrate smoke, dense fog, blowing sand, etc. This version of the cybernetic eye is single-function eye and looks more like a natural, unaltered eye.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
